item.title: Fortnite Creative island ‘Disneyland Game Rush’ launches November 6
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS4
  • PS5
  • Switch
  • Switch 2
  • Xbox One
  • Xbox Series

Play mini-games inspired by Disneyland attractions.

Disney, in cooperation with Epic Games, will release the limited-time Fortnite Creative island “Disneyland Game Rush” on November 6 in celebration of Disneyland’s 70th anniversary, the company announced.

Players will be able to compete with friends, earn exclusive rewards, and play mini-games inspired by attractions from Disneyland and Disney California Adventure.

Here is an overview of the Creative island, via Disney:

About

Disneyland Game Rush is a new Fortnite Creative island celebrating Disneyland’s 70th Anniversary. Launching on November 6, Disneyland Game Rush is a playful, limited-time experience for fans that brings the happiness of Disneyland Resort to Fortnite players globally.

Disneyland Game Rush welcomes players into a celebratory hub—with a replica 70th Anniversary sculpture inspired by Sleeping Beauty Castle, light musical touches, and skyline nods to iconic Disneyland Resort landmarks. From there, fans can jump into seven quick‑play mini‑games inspired by beloved attractions from Disneyland and Disney California Adventure. Across each experience, players will compete with friends through classic Fortnite gameplay expressed with an authentic Disneyland twist.

By completing mini-games fans will collect keys, and unlock island‑exclusive cosmetics themed to Disneyland’s 70th.

Attractions

  • Guardians of the Galaxy – Mission: Sneak Out! – Attempt to infiltrate The Collector’s Fortress, as inspired by Guardians of the Galaxy – Mission: BREAKOUT located in Avengers Campus.
  • Haunted Mansion: Scavenger Haunt – Explore and discovering secrets, as inspired by the Haunted Mansion located in New Orleans Square in Disneyland Park.
  • Indiana Jones: Tomb Runner – Navigate through a dangerous temple, as inspired by Indiana Jones Adventure located in Adventureland in Disneyland park.
  • Matterhorn: Slip-and-Climb – Grapple and climb to the top, as inspired by the beloved Disneyland park attraction Matterhorn Bobsleds.
  • Space Mountain: Rocket Race – Speed through the cosmos, as inspired by Disneyland park’s iconic Tomorrowland attraction.
  • Star Wars: Stormtrooper Showdown – Battle the First Order, as inspired by the Star Wars: Rise of the Resistance attraction located in Star Wars: Galaxy’s Edge at Disneyland park.
  • WEB-Slingers: Spider-Bot Blasters – Save the Worldwide Engineering Brigade HQ from replicating Spider-Bots, as inspired by the WEB Slingers: A Spider-Man Adventure located in Avengers Campus.

Fortnite is available now for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, Switch 2, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Switch, PC, iOS, and Android.

View a set of screenshots below.
